text: James Harrison Coburn (August 31, 1928 – November 18, 2002) was an American actor. He became famous in the 1960s when he made many Western movies, such as The Magnificent Seven. But after that, he acted in other different types of roles, and became a more complete and successful actor. He was very ill in the 1980s and he almost did not make any more movies in that decade. However, he got better and started acting again in the 1990s. He won an Academy Award in 1998. ==References== == Other websites == * * Find-A-Grave profile for James Coburn * Gesprengte Ketten - The Great Escape, Behind the scenes , Photographs of cameraman Walter Riml. title: James Coburn
